text: Is there a way to quickly switch between different julia executables (for example different julia versions) in julia-vscode?

elements.text: Is there a way to quickly switch between different julia executables (for example different julia versions) in julia-vscode?

text: Similar to how we can switch between different environments.

elements.text: Similar to how we can switch between different environments.

text: Yes, just click on the “Julia env: 1.5” (or 1.4, 1.3, whatever you have) in the bottom bar, to the left, and a popup menu will appear in the top bar.

elements.text: Yes, just click on the “Julia env: 1.5” (or 1.4, 1.3, whatever you have) in the bottom bar, to the left, and a popup menu will appear in the top bar.

text: This is for changing the environment not the julia version/executable.

text: There is no support for that, you can only change the configuration setting. What you can do is have a workspace specific setting, so that depending on which folder you open, you get a different Julia version.
